Package com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces

Interface ICandi

  • public interface ICandi
    Interface for all Compilers and all Interpreters except Une transpiler.

    Note: UneC is different (it does not implements ICandi) because the Une transpiler has to manage one or (normally) more source files (all others languages managed by Mingle use only one chunk of source code) and this makes things much more complex.

    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  ICandi.IBuilder  
      static interface  ICandi.IError  
      static interface  ICandi.ILanguage  
      static interface  ICandi.IPrepared
      This interface contains foreign (not Une) code ready to be used by the Mingle ExEn: it is compiled code for languages like Java or C or the source code itself for JS and others.
